text:
Horison Palma Pangandaran selalu jadi tujuan menginap nomer 1 tiap ke Pangandaran. Lokasi nya strategis dekat sekali dengan Pantai Barat.  
Mulai dari security, resepsionis, petugas kebersihan,  staf restoran dan staf hotel lainnya sangat ramah dan baik.  Pelayanan bagus,  kamar bersih dan nyaman. Proses check in cepat. 
Petugas kebersihan jg selalu sigap,  setiap ada lantai yg basah/kotor segera di pel dan dibersihkan.  Bikin nyaman.  Makanan hotelnya enak dan porsi kenyang dengan harga standar.  Untuk breakfast nya menu nya ckup variatif dan enak2.

Liburan akhir pekan di Horison Palma Pangandaran sungguh menyenangkan dan puas.

text:
Pelayanan check-in yg sangat lama, sampai harus menunggu beberapa menit dari waktu check in yg sewajarnya, dg alasan kamar masih on progress.

Banyaknya demand yg menginap di Horison Palma Pangandaran, seharusnya menjadi kesiapan team dalam memberikan pelayanan terbaiknya, bukannya menyiapkan excuse yg seolah tidak memberikan kenyamanan kepada pelanggannya.

Madys rooftop sangat tidak siap untuk memberikan pelayanan yg membuat nyaman, beberapa wall interior rusak, bunga tidak terurus, wastafel yg tidak buat nyaman dan terkesan tidak diurus. Dan sangat jauh berbeda dari presentasi di website.

Mohon untuk front desk perempuan, lebih baik lagi dalam menjawab telfon, saya telfon 2x dia menjawabnya terbata-bata, tidak menggambarkan manner front desk disaat online menjawab telfon, memalukan.

Kesan pertama saya menginap di Horison Palma Pangandaran, saya menilai team tidak bersyukur setelah hotel tutup beroperasi selama 2bl lebih karena covid, dan disaat new normal, team seolah ngejar target, yg penting occupancy terpenuhi sampai lupa maintanance service team yg terkesan tidak profesional.

text:
3 hari 2 malam rasanya masih tak cukup untuk keliling pesisir pantai yang ada di pangandaran, dari mulai madasari, batu karas, batu hiu, green canyon,karang tirta, pananjung, pasir putih, dan karapyak...selepas nenda (ngemping)  di pantai madasari kita pasti rehat cantik dan nyaman di Hotel Horison Palma Pangandaran.. 

3 Juli kemarin, adalah kesekian kalinya kami menginap di horison, tanya mengapa? Horison dirindu,kamar yang nyaman,pelayanannya sangat baik, pun para Staf nya ramah,menu sarapan bikin kenyang,enak dipandang enak dimakan 😁

Ada sesal di hati karena kemarin tak sempat kencan berdua di mady's caffe and grill (rooftop) selepas anak-anak tidur (kebiasaan kita kencan diam-diam selepas c bocah terlelap hiii) , tersebab masih edisi new normal jadi tutup lebih awal...mantap protokol kesehatan amat sangat diperhatikan.  

Pokoknya... horison bikin nagih,kaka dan dede betahhh banget. 
Horison,kita pasti kembali 😁😁😍😍

text:
Saya menulis ulasan ini karena saya sangat kecewa dengan layanan, kebersihan & keramahan selama saya tinggal di hotel ini.
Kami menginap pada tanggal 1 Juli 2020 di kamar #307 dan jg dgn rekan-rekan saya di 2 kamar berbeda.
 1. Ada banyak serangga (seperti lebah besar) di kamar saya sepanjang malam (gambar terlampir)
 2. Kamar mandi dengan air panas tidak bekerja;  airnya selalu dingin
 3. Tempat tidur atau dinding atau wallpapar benar-benar berdebu (membuat saya batuk sepanjang malam)
 4. Saya sudah memesan sarapan dari jam 7.30 pagi & menelepon resepsionis (Friska) sebanyak 3 kali tetapi jawabannya tidak menyelesaikan masalah.  Akhirnya sarapan datang pada pukul 9.15 & saya sudah bersiap untuk pergi & check out dan itu membuat saya terlambat untuk meeting

Meskipun saya terburu-buru, saya mencoba untuk bertemu dengan Manajer yang bertugas; tetapi sekali lagi Manajer yang bertugas (Bpk. Bangkit - GM) membuat saya menunggu selama 30 menit & krn saya tidak bisa menunggu, akhirnya tidak berhasil menemuinya dan saya pergi dengan semua kekecewaan saya.

text:
Pro (+)

Staffnya ramah2 banget.
Handuk diganti setiap hari bahkan handuk yg masih kami pakai (niatnya mau eco green) eh diganti juga.
Bantalnya banyak dan empuk (seorang dapat 2 buah besar2).
Makanan cafe nya lumayan.
Lokasi strategis banget (dekat tukang jualan baju2, makanan dan oleh2).
Ada tempat bilas2 sebelum masuk hotel.
Tidak diminta uang deposit (PENTING hahaha..)

Kontra (-)

Wifi ngga sampai ke kamar. Jadi dikamar sama sekali ngga dapet akses wifi (room 209).
Ngga ada tempat jemur baju (kalau dari pantai pasti kan semua basah).
Refill makanan sarapannya lumayan lama (jadi sering nunggu kr blm di refill).
Sarapan kurang variasi (secara kami 5 hari nginep disana).
Mobil ngga dicuciin / bahkan di lap kacanya (di hotel sebelah sanaan mobil2 tamu dicuciin).
Kolam renang kecil banget (kalau pas lagi rame anak2 malah ngga enak).
Pertama kali masuk kamar, kunci kamar ngga bisa dipakai untuk nyalain lampu, komplain dulu baru dikasih kunci yg bener.
AC dikamar 209 bocor dan sempat dibetulin dan tambah freon oleh staf hotel.
Sudah antri omellet dan dibilang mau diantar ke meja, ditungguin ngga dateng2 eh pas disamperin malah dikasih ke orang yg baru dateng.
Staf restoran hotel bisa ikut ambil sarapan bareng tamu; ada yang ngambil kopi, ada yang ikutan antri buffet (dan buat saya itu ngga profesional banget sih)
Restoran tempat sarapan cukup kecil sehingga pada saat musim liburan kemarin, banyak tamu yang tidak mendapatkan tempat duduk dan harus menunggu/antri

text:
Termasuk hotel yg cukup bagus, staff yang ramah, kamar yang cukup bersih, hanya saja wastafel retak, tapi bukan hal besar buat saya. Lokasi strategis, persis pinggir pantai dengan zona berenang yg menyenangkan, dekat dengan cagar alam, juga dekat dengan pantai timur yg merupakan area permainan seperti banana boat, donat, dsb. Dekat dengan restoran yg enak, juga banyak jajanan di sekitar hotel.

Ada rooptop cafe (mady's gellato), sayang tidak sempat mencicipi, karena pas malam ke sana, sudah sold out, dan waktu itu ada live music yg kalau menurut saya malah bikin suasana cafe terlalu riuh, tadinya saya membayangkan bisa duduk santai di sana, menikmati langit malam dan deburan ombak

Salah satu kelebihan hotel ini dibanding hotel lain yg pernah saya coba di pangandaran adalah sarapannya, ragamnya cukup banyak, dan rasanya enak

text:
saya review karena saya menginap di pengandaran 2 malam dengan 2 hotel yang berbeda dikarenakan padat nya hotel horison. jadi saya dapat bandingkan head to head dengan hotel satu nya.

keunggulan hotel ini:
-posisi sangat strategis untuk ke area pantai yang aman untuk berenang
- rooftop dengan pemandangan menakjubkan ke arah pantai + tempat yang asyik.
- loby cukup bagus
- kamar lumayan bersih

kekurangannya;
- kamar lebih kecil dibanding hotel yang saya lain yg saya inap malam berikutnya
- cukup ramai, ada kamar dengan beda view saja ke pantai dengan harga 50% lebih mahal
- handuk belum tersedia ketika check in dengan kualitas handuk yang kurang nyaman
- sarapan nya. cukup banyak macam nya tapi, banyak tapi nya nih:
80% menurut saya tidak enak
bubur ayam di sajikan dingin (ada yang suka bubur ayam dingin?)
sop merah nya cukup kecut menurut saya tidak bisa di makan
nasi goreng tidak enak
jagung di salad tidak enak
roti nya juga biasa aja.
yang cukup enak cuma kentang saja, terpaksa saya memuaskan sarapan saya dengan kentang panggang nya.
- capucino nya juga gak enak, sekali isi cuma separo cangkir

-restorant rooftop juga tidak ada yang spesial:
salmon nya tidak teralu enak
tom yum gong nya teralu pedas & berminyak
- obat anak saya ketinggalan di kulkas kamar, dalam waktu sekitar 4 jam istri saya telp ke pihak hotel, katanya akan mengabari. ternayat di tunggu 2 jam tidak ada kabar, akhir nya istri saya datang ke hotel yang katanya tidak ada apa apa di kulkas, tetapi akhir nya ketemu staf lainnya dan mengatakan sudah terbuang & tidak dapat di temukan. please dont lie, tell the truth is more diginity i think.

jadi apakah saya akan menginap di sini lagi? saya kira tidak, tapi buat anda yang mau mencoba silahkan.
title: hotel cukup ramai di pengandaran, bagus tapi banyak kurang nya

owner_response.text:
Dear Bapak Simon E,
Terima kasih telah mengirimkan ulasan tersebut. Mengenai kendala yang Bapak dan keluarga alami selama menginap, kami meminta maaf atas ketidaknyamanan tersebut. Adapun kendala tersebut, kami menghimbau beberapa hal sebagai berikut agar tidak terjadi kesalahpahaman :

- Untuk type kamar Family, itu sudah benar kamar tersebut merupakan type kamar Family, untuk kamar mandi yang tembus pandang, akan kami diskusikan dengan manajemen. 

- Mengenai deposit merupakan regulasi di hotel kami, yang di mana semua bookingan kamar di hotel kami adalah guaranteed.

- Untuk check out time merupakan regulasi umum di setiap hotel, dikarenakan pada saat itu occupancy (tingkat hunian) kamar kami sedang ramai dan membutuhkan waktu untuk dimake-up (dirapikan) untuk tamu selanjutnya agar tidak late check in. 

Terima kasih,

General Manager
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Horison Palma merupakan salah satu hotel baru di Pangandaran. Tempatnya nyaman, meskipun agak sedikit kotor akibat letaknya di dekat pantai. Kamarnya juga nyaman, tersedia wifi, air panas, dan balkon untuk menjemur pakaian. Kalau mau dapat view ke pantai harus pesan dari jauh hari agar kebagian. Saya sudah dua kali pergi ke Pangandaran. Yang terakhir, Pangandaran sudah sangat ramai dan sepertinya hal tersebut membuat liburan jadi tidak nyaman. Kalau mau berlibur di Pangandaran lebih baik di bulan puasa. Karena lebih sepi pengunjung. Tapi tempat makan, berbelanja, dan tempat wisata masih buka.

Saya meningap di Horison sudah 2x. Pertama tahun lalu pada saat horison baru grand opening. Kedua saya menginap bulan lalu 2 malam, check in 08 Mei 2017-10 Mei 2017.Pada saat saya masuk ke lobby di lobby sedang ramai dan yg disayangkan pada saat itu di lobby banyak staff incharge but not helpful. lalu saya check in dgn proses yg aga lama karna banyak yg check in juga. saat saya masuk ke kamar amenities belum lengkap&belum ada bath mat. setelah saya tlp ke hk baru di fu. i think it's ok it's just human error i don't mind. 
point plusnya saya order ke room service pelayannya baik sekali menjelaskan menu satu persatu karna dikamar tdk ada display menu&pada saat makanan datang dikasih dessert slice cake 2pcs. i'm so thank you for that. makanannya enak&recommended. breakfast so far so good with many variety of food.& yg pasti rooftopnya yg bagus untuk foto&santai sambil lihat sunset.
yang membuat saya tulis ratting Bad adalahh security yang selalu incharge pakai batik itu kaya satpam pabrik. no greeting, no smiling, no helpful. kalau security yg lain yg pakai seragam hitam itu ramah&mau membantu kecuali yg 1 itu. berkali kali saya ketemu gapernah greeting atau senyum sama sekali, tapi ke tamu yg lain yg parkirin mobil dia senyum. atau karna saya pakai roda 2 jd bapa tersebut males? waktu dia bantu parikirin motor suami saya, suami saya blg "makasih ya pa" dia ga jawab&langsung pergi dgn wajah sebal. seperti itukah attitude org hotel? saya lupa galihat name tagnya namanya siapa. saya juga hotelier saya tau org hotel semestinya bagaimana. tahun lalu pelayanannya excellent karna itu saya mau balik lagi, kalau begini saya tdk yakin. tolong diperbaiki. thank you

text:
3 malam menginap disini sangat menyenangkan, lokasi strategis di pantai barat pananjung pangandaran, hanya berjalan kaki diseberang jalan sudah sampai pantai barat, 20 meter jalan kaki bisa sampai pintu masuk cagar alam, ke pantai timur juga dekat, tinggal jalan kaki lewati jalan kecil kurang lebih 1km.
Kamar yang cukup bagus untuk liburan atau perjalanan kerja, dilengkapi balkon di setiap kamar untuk smoking area. Bangunan yang masih baru, bersih dan nyaman serta pegawai hotel yang ramah.
Breakfast bermacam pilihan, hanya agak terasa sempit jika terlalu banyak tamu yang sarapan diwaktu yang sama. Kolam renang cukup untuk relax, hanya harus ditegaskan kepada tamu, untuk tidak mengeringkan badan setelahnya agar lantai tidak licin menuju lobby dan sekitarnya.
Saat high season, parkiran depan hotel cukup penuh, dan sedikit macet, namun disediakan parkir luas di samping hotel.
Yang paling special adalah rooftopnya, bisa nikmati pemandangan sunrise dari pantai timur sekaligus sunset dari pantai barat. Dan melihat hijaunya pepohonan hijau cagar alam sekaligus lautan yang luas.
title: Sunrise and Sunset from rooftop 😍

Saya menginap di hotel ini tanggal 21 juli 2016,
awalnya kami sangat tertarik melihat hotel ini dengan bangunan baru dan lokasi strategis dekat dengan pantai.
Akhirnya kami memutuskan untuk menginap,kami disambut dengan staf yang ramah.
kekecewaan kami di mulai pada saat di kamar dan menghidupkan air di kamar mandi,kami mencium bau got atau bau wc,di lorong menuju ke kamar bau rokok.pada malam hari ac di kamar bocor sehingga mengganggu tidur.
pada saat kami menginap bersamaan sedang ada corporate yang booking hotel ini.
malam hari saat jam tidur mereka sangat berisik sampai jam 12 malam dan pihak management hotel tidak melakukan tindakan apapun.
sepertinya pihak management hotel takut untuk menegur bookingan corporate tersebut,
kekecewaan kami bertambah pada saat breakfast,dimana di ruang breakfast banyak sekali orang merokok.Pada saat kami complaint ke pihak hotel memang di hotel ini semua area termasuk di kamar boleh merokok.
Tidak sampai di situ saja,jam 9 kami breakfast makanan sudah tinggal sisa dan banyak lalat yang hinggap di makanannnya.
kami sarankan untuk travelers yang tidak suka bau rokok dan ingin tenang dan hendak memilih hotel ini untuk berpikir 10 kali,karena akan kecewa.

text:
We stayed 1 night only. The only good thing about this hotel is the bed. The bed was so comfortable with a relly good quality bedsheets almost the same like sleeping in 5 star hotel. International standard, that's all i can say. The wifi in the room didn't work well during busy hours. The room wasn't big..but the interior wasn't bad compared to other hotels in Pangandaran. But it has everything in it: a mini safe, cable tv, free drinking water and snacks, water kettle, coffee and tea as usual.
The swimming pool was nice and clean.
The rooftop cafe with sea view was amazing ...reasonable price...the Gelato didnt look good though.
But we were very disappointed with the breakfast.
We went to the restaurant at 6 am to avoid the crowd cause we saw a lot of people from government stayed there. But all food was cold..the sausages were cold, the omelette were cold...even the capuccino from the coffee machine wasn't hot.the salad wasn't fresh..the bread tasted like plastic..the dimsums weren't cooked and hard, the cake wasn't nice. all food was cold, I think the fire from the food warmer didn't work properly or maybe they don't know what they're doing.they need to learn A LOT about providing breakfast especially for western guests..

The exterior of the hotel needs to be redesigned with more plants or trees..so it would look more attractive.

We might stay again but WE'LL BRING OUR OWN BREAKFAST.
title: Breakfast needs to be fixed.

text:
I stayed in the hotel for a few days, and I must say it might be one of the best hotels that I have stayed in. 

The hotel lays next to the beach in which we can observe the sunset and sunrise where the sun seems  mix among the clouds painting the sky with its colours, an absolute eye-candy 

The rooms are tidy and comfortable, the bathroom and the toilet are absolutely sanitary and clean, there's some snacks and some drinks set on the table for the guests, overall the accomodation is salubrious 

The staffs gives their utmost efforts and dedication to give us a kind and welcoming stay in the hotel, they take pride and joy in their work. Their hospitality really blow our mind.

The food that they offer introduces us to the local flavours around the area, especially when it comes to seafood, moreover they also offer us gelato ice-cream and all sorts of snacks and delights in their rooftop bar, which are an absolute delight which accompanies us as we view the open and wide beaches in Pangandaran.

We recommend this hotel and definitely will come back here.
title: Absolutely idyllic, comfortable and ideal!! Recommended hotel

text: We stayed for 3 nights here. Staff was super friendly and helpful, check-in check-out was smooth. The first night, I got room 233 and unfortunately, since the hotel room wasn't equipped with double-glazed windows, the room was so noisy. I requested for a quieter room and the staff managed to find me a much quieter room the next day. I was assisted by Ratna who was very attentive throughout our stay. The hotel's deluxe room (room 201) is spacious enough for us (2 adults and 1 pre-teen). Air conditioner made strange sounds but technicians came right away and fixed it, problem solved. The location is very convenient, it's just across the beach and close to the market (if you plan to buy some local products of preserved fish).
title: Super helpful staff

text:
I choose this hotel based on the review from here.

2 Good things about this hotel the location in front of the sandy beach where you can walk directly from the lobby to the beach in less than 50 meters and second thing the air conditioner working well.

The downside from this property and the services 
- not good experience on check-in. We already request high floor room, but we have the room beside the lobby. The lady receptionist said full book, no room available - personally i don't like her gesture such a arrogant person
- entering the room smells bad, toilet smell even we put our mask on still we can smell it very bad - we ask to change the room the lady receptionist said no room just need spray room, we agree and i mentioned if still smell they need to change our room. We go out for dinner and after back to the room the smell still strong, we asked to change the room, the male receptionist directly relocate our room and apologized for the inconvenience - kudos to this guy and i recognized his service after entering the room and make a phone call to reception to say how i appreciate his service.
- the room actually still a bit toilet smell but not very smelly we still can compromise it.
- the TV not clear like using the conventional TV antenna for the hotel should be better with the TV cable or satellite. 
- room acoustic not good, we can hear foot step and voice from the aile very clear, i wake up early morning because the next door close like slaming it and kids crying voice 
- the room ans toilet not maintained well, one down light off, peeled wall paper, rusting balcony fence and the toilet have a lot stain. 
- not ready with room towel, so they bring us the pool towel :( lucky we bring our own towel
- for the breakfast section; the coffee cup need replacement because the dent on all coffee cup at the tray. 
- the spoon need to make sure clean because i need to change the spoon 2 time for the clean one
- pool very small not like the photo, only 8 people and already full
- pool water so dirty because many guest directly jump to swimming pool after playing on the beach with out cleaning their body. 
- not enough staff to remind the guest to dry them self before entering building, my daughter almost fall after she slip because of the water on the elevator floor. 
- car park don't have a indoor facility so your car will directly under the sun and the moon, make sure you wash your car after arrive to your house because we park the car in front of the beach and it contains a salt that can damaged your car. 

That's my honest review hopefully the management will improve and this review usefull  for the people have a plan to stay in this hotel so you can managed your expectations before entering this facility.
title: Honest review about this property

text: My 2nd time staying here. Great hotel and wonderful sea view, covid protocol is quite good. Best thing was the Rooftop Mady's Gelato Cafe & Grill, thank you Ka Fauzi for the service and amazing food. We'll definitely be back again.

text:
I booked Horison Palma because the pictures looked amazing and its ideal location next to the national park. Horison Hotel Group is quite well known in Indonesia so I thought it was a safe bet but I was never so wrong.
The corridor leading up to my room was dark and depressing. My towels weren't white but they're grey (I guess they don't even know how to do their laundry properly). Shower, toilet and sink was covered in mould it was so disgusting! 
My sister's room was even worse because her mirror was covered in rust.
Their restaurant upstairs was quite dusty, sofa covered in stains and I was wary about the hygiene level.
Breakfast was so so, mostly catered to Indonesians, and nothing to write home about. 
It's got a lot of potential but sadly the management is such a let down.
They need to retrain their cleaning staff because in a few years this hotel will look really run down.
Save your money and book the Nyiur Beach next door instead, at least they keep their rooms clean.

The only plus side of this hotel is its friendly staff, but that is to be expected especially in Indonesia.
title: Calling it a 3 star hotel is a stretch!

text:
Hotel location was good, just a 5 minutes stroll away from pangandaran nature reserve. And the wave in front of hotel is relatively good to swim, unlike other parts of pangandaran. Location wise it is good, lots of restaurants, stalls and stores are accessible by walk. Clean hotels. Housekeeping and other hotel staffs were very nice and friendly. Especially breakfast f&b staffs, they offered me tea, coffee and egg.

The cons were, there are too many scheduled government and corporate meetings, that makes uncomfortable for holiday travellers. Rooms are small(deluxe), balconies face to face with other rooms are giving less privacy and no good scenery. Went downstair for breakfast. The salad was not fresh especially tomatoes, it already had rotten smell, the taste was so so. Again as other review in Pangandaran ive written, front desk staffs were slow to check in and check out, and they need to be more courtesy and friendly. 

Hotel must fix those problem because its horison hotel chain. You have standard.
title: It was a bit disappointing

text:
When booking, request made for a high floor room and said request confirmed by hotel. Upon arrival confronted with surcharge as this ‘ is hotel policy to inform guest on checkin’. Manager hopefully meantime has recovered from severe indigestion, as he was unavailable for the entire stay with reasons provided ranging from eating to ‘on the toilet’, leaving the reception to deal with no authority.
They may not have realised that, understanding a little Bahasa Indonesia, their claim was that we agreed to the surcharge on checkin.
The food is not of good quality with roomservice coming back two times asking why the undercooked burger was not acceptable and the towels are dirty and seemingly used.
While the location is opposite the beach it is also at a busy street with street noises starting early and clearly through a window that cannot be shut properly.
The staff remains friendly, however, is dismissive and management is not accountable. As such, I would not recommend the hotel, rather a nice homestay nearby unless the crowds, noise and short commute to the beach are a must. In parting I hope that the manager has since left the toilet, it must be very inconvenient indeed to be ravaged by a stomach challenge at a time like that, or being locked in perhaps and unable to figure out the mechanism.
title: The carpet does not match the drapes

text:
Need waited too long for check in procces.. they said CO time is 12.00.. but many guest CO at 13.00-13.30.. I have to waited for all guest CO? But its okay 'cause their policy CI time is 14.00.. and I got my key on 14.20 after waited more than 1 hour..some guest ask twice for their ID card during registration and staff forget which guest had registration or not.. My daughter getting sick and i ask for thermometer, and  they didn't have it..seriously? As well as I know even for food safety management they should using thermometer.. importantly for guest first aid needs.. So I went to pharmacy in Pangandaran and I ask my car keys to FO at 02.30 AM, but when I go to lobby FO staff lying down on FO counter floor. No 24 hours clinic at Pangandaran Area, and also no Hospital..After that I feel soo hungry and call Room Service but no one answer my call.. I check menu compedium and couldn't find open hours for Room Service.. Please notice if your Room Service is not 24 hours..
Hotel building is Ok, facility is good except parking Area.. Bad for service..
Very lucky this Hotel didn't have a real chain Hotel competitor..

text:
We ordered 4 main courses at Maddy's Gelato on Lebaran holiday. After 30 mins of waiting, the waiter has just informed us that one of the menu we ordered, was sold out (very disappointing that we must wait for 30 mins to be informed that the food was not available). It's fine, we changed to other menu several times (since some of other menu also not available). Unfortunately, there was rain, the cafe is designed not suitable to be enjoyed in raining!!! All the guest must finished to enjoy the food because of the rain water flooded the rooftop. We informed the staff that we have to relocated our dinner to restaurant at ground level (1 hour after ordering the food, and no food was come out!!!). When we reach the restaurant, we repeated  our order twice (once to the Front Office's staff and Restaurant's staff), in order to minimize another wasting time. What did it happened? We were dissapointed to leave the hotel after more than 2 hours waiting, just one menu was come out instead of 4 menu we ordered!!! When paying the bills, no changing money for our bills. Finally, I am "forced" to give it as a tips to the restaurant (of course we didn't mind to give a tips for such a really bad service). It was at 10 pm when we leave the restaurant, that  other restaurants at Pangandaran has closed already at that time. No dinner for us, just only wasting our holiday time. Definitely, It is not meet standard of international hotel services.

Note : good and luxury appearance restaurant does not guarantee good service tough.
title: Poor service of Maddy's Gelato and Hotel Restaurant
